Description:
Dash through foes while spinning and apply a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_DashAttack_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_DashAttack_Slow.BaseDuration]}s</font> on hit.

First Hit: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_DashAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.
Second Hit: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_DashAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This attack cannot backstab.)</font> 

Enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font> when this ability ends.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_DashAttack_Empower.DMGStandard * 100]}% </font>  <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_DashAttack_Empower.BaseDuration]}s</font> after hitting a target with Relentless Rush.

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font>, Relentless Rush applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">root</font> to targets it hits for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_DashAttack_Root.BaseDuration]}s</font>.\n\nIn <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font>, Relentless Rush <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heals</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Upgrade_Greatsword_Dash_2.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of its damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Upgrade_Greatsword_Dash_2.NumberOfTrackedHits]} hits.)</font>

Reduces ability <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldown</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greatsword_Dash_3.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> when you kill a foe. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a {[GreatswordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greatsword_Dash_3.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown.)</font>

Slash <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> times in a quick sequence.

First Hit: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Combo1.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.
Second Hit: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Combo2.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.
Third Hit: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Combo3.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.

Enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font> when this ability ends.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> while performing Crosscut.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font>, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stun immunity</font> while performing Crosscut.

Base damage of the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">final strike</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greatsword_Combo_2.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> if the target is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greatsword_Combo_2.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.\n\nIn <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font>, this threshold is increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Upgrade_Greatsword_Combo_2.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> instead.

Swing up in a brutal arc, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> your target, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_DefenseBreak1.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and applying <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2</font> stacks of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Rend.ABSStandard * -100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Rend.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Rend.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font> apply <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1</font> additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font>.

Enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font> when this ability ends.

Add a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">followup attack</font> that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_DefenseBreak2.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage by activating the skill again or using a light attack.

The <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">first attack</font> applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">disease</font> which reduces healing by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_DefenseBreak_Disease.HealMod * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_DefenseBreak_Disease.BaseDuration]}s</font>.\n\nThe <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">followup attack</font> strikes all foes within a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> radius.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Increases</font> base attack damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Off_1.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> when attacking foes above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Off_1.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.
Charged heavy attacks have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Off_2.ArmorPenetration * 100]}%</font> armor penetration.

Gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_HasteAfterSkill.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_HasteAfterSkill.BaseDuration]}s</font> after using any Onslaught tree ability. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a {[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Off_3.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown.)</font>

After gaining <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font>, your next attack within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_NextHitCrit.BaseDuration]}s</font> has a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_NextHitCrit.CritChanceModifier * 100]}%</font> increased <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">critical hit chance</font>.

Enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font> by hitting with a charged heavy attack. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(This effect occurs even if the attack is blocked but will not renew onslaught stance if it is already active.)</font>

Become <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">energized</font> by landing a critical hit and regain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_StaminaRegen.Stamina]} stamina</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_StaminaRegen.HealthModifierBasePercent * 100]}% base health</font> per second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_StaminaRegen.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a {[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Off_6.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Critical hit chance</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Off_7.CritChance * 100]}%</font> when attacking foes with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>.

After dodging, gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_AfterDodgeEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font> for the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_AfterDodgeEmpower.StopOnHitCount]}</font> hits within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_AfterDodgeEmpower.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect only occurs when in combat.)</font>\n\nAttacks empowered by this effect restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Passive_Greatsword_Off_8.Stamina]} stamina</font> on hit.

Hitting foes reduces greatsword <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldowns</font>:
Light attack: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Ultimate_Greatsword_Offense.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>
Charged heavy attack: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Ultimate_Greatsword_Offense_1.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(Cooldown reduction only occurs once per attack.)</font>

Block for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2s</font> while reducing block stamina damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Greatsword_Counter_BlockStability.BlockDamageReduction * 100]}%</font>, then unleash a counterattack that strikes all foes within a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4m</font> radius.

No Blocks: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Counter.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.
1 Block: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Counter_1.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggers</font>.
2 Blocks: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Counter_2.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggers</font> longer.
3 Blocks: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Counter_3.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and causes a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">knockback</font>.

This ability has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font>.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282"> (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

Reactivate this abiilty or use light attack to counterattack earlier.

Enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font> when this ability ends.

Counter attacks inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleeding</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Bleed.BaseDuration]}s</font> for each power level. Each stack deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Bleed.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage every second. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Bleed.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

Counter attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">crit chance</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greatsword_Counter_2.CritChance * 100]}%</font>.

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font>, the counter attack gains an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Greatsword_Counter_BonusCrit.CritChance * 100]}%</font> critical hit chance.

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font>, the counter attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heals</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Greatsword_Counter_BonusLifesteal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of its damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Greatsword_Counter_BonusLifesteal.NumberOfTrackedHits]} hits.)</font>

Stab your greatsword forward to impale your foes, then pull back to rip the blade out. Restores <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Ability_Greatsword_DrainAttack.Stamina]}</font> stamina on each hit.

First Hit: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_DrainAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggers</font>.
Second Hit: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_DrainAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pulls</font> target <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_DrainAttack2.ImpactDistanceY * -1]}m</font> towards you.

This ability generates <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_DrainAttack1.ThreatMultiplier * 100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">threat</font>.

Enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font> when this ability ends.

If the first strike of Steadfast Strike hits, you are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healed</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_DrainAttack_Heal.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.\n\nIn <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font>, the first strike also inflicts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2</font> stacks of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleeding</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Bleed.BaseDuration]}s</font> which deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Bleed.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage every second. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Bleed.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

If the second strike of Steadfast Strike hits, reduce the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldown</font> of all other greatsword abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greatsword_Drain_2.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

Stab the ground and send out a shockwave with a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Greatsword.Spell_Ability_Greatsword_Burst.Radius]}m</font> radius that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Burst.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Fortify.ABSStandard * 100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Fortify.BaseDuration]}s</font> for each foe hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Fortify.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

This ability generates <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Burst_Push.ThreatMultiplier * 100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">threat</font> and has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font>.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282"> (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

Enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font> when this ability ends.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your greatsword, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.Greatsword_Burst.TauntDuration]}s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>

Cleanse <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greatsword_Burst_1.NumStatusEffectsToRemove]} </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuffs.</font> after using Roaring Rupture.

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font>, the shockwave <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pushes</font> foes outward <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Burst_Push.ImpactDistanceY]}m</font>.\n\nIn <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font>, the shockwave <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pulls</font> foes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Greatsword_Burst_Pull.ImpactDistanceY * -1]}m</font> towards you.

The shockwave applies a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Burst_Weaken.DMGStandard * -100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weaken</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Burst_Weaken.BaseDuration]}s</font> on hit. Additionally, after a successful hit become <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">uninterruptible</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Burst_NoInterrupt.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

If you are hit while at full health, reduce the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">damage taken</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Def_1.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}%</font> then gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_FortifyFullHealth.ABSStandard * 100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_FortifyFullHealth.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a {[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Def_1.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown.)</font>

Hitting with the final attack of the greatsword chain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">reduces</font> the duration of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuffs</font> on you by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Def_2.StatusEffectDurationMult * -100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a {[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Def_2.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown.)</font>

Base damage is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Def_3.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> for each greatsword <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">buff</font> on you. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Def_3.PerStatusEffectOnSelfMax]} buffs.)</font>

After gaining <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font>, the next damage taken within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_NextHitReduce.BaseDuration]}s</font> is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_NextHitReduce.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Does not apply to damage from debuffs.)</font>

Blocking for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Def_5.InActionTime]}s</font> causes you to enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(You must be in combat for this effect to activate. This effect will not renew defiant stance if it is already active.)</font>

Charged heavy attacks have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> and inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleeding</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Bleed.BaseDuration]}s</font> dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Bleed.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage every second. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Bleed.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

Enables <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">blocking ranged attacks</font> with a greatsword, but increases stamina damage from blocking any attack by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Passive_Greatsword_Def_7.BlockDamageReduction * -100]}%</font>.

Reduce the attackers <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stamina damage</font> dealt by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Passive_Greatsword_Def_8_BlockReduce.BlockDamageReduction * 100]}%</font> when blocking attacks just after raising your guard or with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">guard point</font>. \n\nBlocking attacks within this window inflicts a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Rend.ABSStandard * -100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Rend.BaseDuration]}s</font> against melee attackers. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stacking_Rend.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Heal</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Ultimate_Greatsword_Defense.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of the damage from attacks.\n\nAttacking within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Passive_RecentBlock.BaseDuration]}s</font> of blocking an attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heals</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatswordAbilityTable.Helper_Ultimate_Greatsword_Defense.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of the damage dealt instead.

After using any ability in the Onslaught tree, enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">onslaught stance</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stance_Offense.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Onslaught stance has the following properties:
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Outgoing Damage</font> Increased: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stance_Offense.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font>
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Damage Taken</font> Increased: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stance_Offense.WKNStandard * 100]}%</font>
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Quick Charge</font>: Heavy attacks charge <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">twice as fast</font> but consume <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[StaminaCosts_Player.Greatsword_Offense_Attack.StaminaCost]} stamina</font> each

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Entering defiant stance or switching weapons will immediately end onslaught stance.)</font>

After using any ability in the Defiance tree, enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">defiant stance</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stance_Defense.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Defiant stance has the following properties:
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Damage Taken</font> Reduced: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stance_Defense.WKNStandard * 100]}%</font>
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Outgoing Damage</font> Reduced: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Greatsword_Stance_Defense.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font>
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Guard Point</font>: Block incoming attacks while charging heavy attacks <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(Entering onslaught stance or switching weapons will immediately end defiant stance.)</font>
